items.text: clipped to short midwicket
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Asghar Afghan, no run

items.preText: Afghanistan need 161 in the second half of their innings. It's not impossible, but it's looking more and more difficult
items.text: fired into the pads and turned away to deep square leg
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 1 run

items.text: flat on the stumps, he comes forward to defend solidly
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Asghar Afghan, no run

items.text: hit straight to cover
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Asghar Afghan, no run

items.text: flat and angling into him, defends it
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Asghar Afghan, no run

items.text: fired in again, he takes it from off and turns it to square leg
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Asghar Afghan, 1 run

items.text: goes wider of off and he tries to cut but misses
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hashmatullah Shahidi, no run

items.text: tossed up, full on the stumps, and he's manipulated it into the legside
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Asghar Afghan, 1 run

items.text: stays back to punch it through cover
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 1 run

items.text: quicker one on the stumps, tucked to midwicket
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Asghar Afghan, 1 run

items.text: flatter but fuller, angling in, he whips it away to square leg
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 1 run

items.text: length ball on off, he comes forward to punch it back to the bowler
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Asghar Afghan, no run

items.text: length on the stumps, goes deep in his crease to turn it to midwicket
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Asghar Afghan, 1 run

items.preText: A nuggest from Isam, our Bangladesh correspondent: This is Mahmudullah's first ODI wicket since July 2015
items.text: stays in his crease to try and cut this length ball outside off, but only under-edges it to cover
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Asghar Afghan, no run

items.text: got the shot right that time, getting on top of the ball to cut it past point
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Asghar Afghan, 2 runs

items.text: short outside off, and he slaps it through cover
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Asghar Afghan, 1 run

items.text: tossed up on leg stump, he gets down to sweep it to fine leg
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 1 run

items.text: flatter on the stumps, but short enough to tuck between midwicket and long-on and get two
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Asghar Afghan, 2 runs

items.text: length ball outside off, he punches it to cover
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Asghar Afghan, no run

items.text: nearly got through round the wicket and angling into the batsman, that didn't turn but kept coming in. He managed to get bat in down just in time to keep it out
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Hashmatullah Shahidi, no run

items.text: tapped to long-on
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 1 run

items.text: quick single and he puts in the dive at the striker's end. No direct hit though, which would have had him struggling. That was flat on the stumps and turned away, but short midwicket was on it in a flash. Shahidi has hurt himself with that dive and is getting some treatment on the field
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Asghar Afghan, 1 run

items.text: tossed up and full on the stumps, driven down to long-on
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 1 run

items.text: strays down the pads and Asghar has missed out there. Got it fine but straight to short fine leg
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Asghar Afghan, no run

items.text: tapped to the bowler's right, he puts in the dive but can't stop the ball. There's back up though and the batsmen eventually don't take a single
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Asghar Afghan, no run
